title: Could Time Warner cable or any of the other local TV stations bring back the Cozi TV network that WWAY used to carry here?  I really miss all their programs and WWAY can't carry it anymore.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2017/05/is-it-true-that-wtmv-29-in-odgen-is-bringing-back-the-cozi-tv-network-that-wway-dropped/
